segments.text: Freeze ! Police ! Put your hands over your head .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are suspected of hiding illegal drugs , so we are taking you into custody . We â€™ Ve found some heroin in your house . You have the following rights while you are being interviewed . You have the right to remain silent . You don't have to make any statement against your will . You have the right to defense counsel . You have the right to request an investigation of evidence favorable to your case . Do you understand your rights ?
segments.speaker: S1
